text:
"Kitbull" is a 2019 American animated short movie directed and written by Rosana Sullivan, produced by Pixar Animation Studios, and made by Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures.
It is the third movie in Pixar's "SparkShorts" program. It is about stray kitten and an abused pit bull, who form an unlikely friendship. The short premiered at El Capitan Theatre on January 18, 2019, before being released on YouTube on February 18, 2019.
The short was also released on Disney+ on November 12, 2019.
The movie had strong positive reviews. The short was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Animated Short Film at the 92nd Academy Awards.

annotations.surface_form: Academy Award for Best Animated Short Film
